alert.note: Alert for Dawson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 9:52PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Dawson County through 1030 PM CDT... At 952 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles north of Maxwell to Brady to 6 miles west of Curtis. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Gothenburg around 1010 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 209 and 224. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central Nebraska.
